title: E-Football
description: eFootball is a knockout tournament where players compete in an intense series of matches. With 32 players, each match will last 6 minutes, with extra time and penalties if needed. The final will be played for 10 minutes with extra time and penalties. The event ensures fair play and sportsmanship throughout the tournament.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
The team-head should register for the event on behalf of the team.
rules: Players are only allowed to enter the match when they are physically present in the given venue.
The tournament will consist of 32 players.
The tournament will follow a knockout format.
First round fixtures will not be based on seeding but rather based on registration to the event.
Every match (except final) will be played for 6 mins along with extra time and penalties just in case there is no result within 6 mins.
The final will be played for 10 mins with extra time and penalties.
Any violations of the rules will result in disqualification.
At no cost, rematch will be conducted.
Any player that violates the rules or engages in unsportsmanlike conduct may be disqualified.
